Class BlackjackWindow

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      BlackjackWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class BlackjackWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame

A BlackjackWindow is a graphical window designed for the game of blackjack. It knows how to display cards, hands, and players' names.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

BlackjackWindow

public BlackjackWindow(Player[] p)
Create a BlackjackWindow for the given set of players. Entry 0 of the input array should represent the dealer.

Method Detail

redraw

public void redraw()
Re-draw the window - this method should be called whenever there is a change to any player's cards.

close

public void close()
Close the window (remove it from the screen) - this method should be called when the game ends.
